response.name: Get one transaction with ID
response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "code": 200,
    "message": "Transação encontrada.",

        "description": "Transação de teste atualizada",

        "final_date": "2023-04-02 09:53:57",
        "duration": "0 Hours 6 Minutes 30 Seconds",
        "result": 65

}
